Text: Thanks for the upload! I grew up watching Sharukh Khan with my mom and now I wanna get back into it. Is this subbed in english? I will find out lol.
please i am searching for these movies, Dosti(akshay, kareena), rishtey(karisma), paheli and mughal e azaam
Thanks, It's hard to find non-hollywood movies.

The audio is Hindi. The subtitles are .srt English.
The video is medium quality with some slight interlacing artifacts.
There is an audio delay of one-half second (500ms) at the spot I was checking. It appears to be about the same throughout . . . 
VLC Media Player is free and open source and will show the .srt subtitles.
The "j" and "k" keys alter the audio delay. Hit the keys till you get -500ms and all is fine, though I am not certain the audio does not drift. It does seem manageable . . .
